overview: Awarded the Best Commissioned Animation at Ottawa International Animation Festival!!  Awarded Best Short Animated Film at Woodstock Film Festival!!  Official music video for Blockhead's 'The Music Scene'.  An animated mind melt into a post human New York where TV and animals rule. All cast to the sincerely melodic soul of Blockhead's 'The Music Scene.'  Directimated by A.F.Schepperd  Commissioned by Ninjatune Records  Music by Blockhead
title: The Music Scene
